marklogic.body: We're excited in our neighborhood as there are a pair nesting on a local lake (not ours) for the first time in decades. The DNR is keeping the site 'Secret' but some of us know where it is just because we often fish that lake. Now we'll have some competition for the panfish, but I'll never complain about an eagle getting a full belly. There's plenty of fish to go around. :) Every winter we take a drive across the state to visit Sauk City for the Eagle Watching days. Sometimes there are hundreds of birds visible in a very small area. It certainly brightens a Cold January in WI http://www.ferrybluffeaglecouncil.org/eagledays/

object.displayName: Comment on The Transformation, Before Your Eyes by Clive

marklogic.displayName: Clive commented on The Transformation, Before Your Eyes
